00032 // CedrusXidDriver.cpp : Implementation of DLL Exports.
00033 
00034 //
00035 // Note: COM+ 1.0 Information:
00036 //      Please remember to run Microsoft Transaction Explorer to install the component(s).
00037 //      Registration is not done by default. 
00038 
00039 #include "stdafx.h"
00040 #include "resource.h"
00041 #include "CedrusXidDriver_i.h"
00042 #include "dllmain.h"
00043 
00044 
00045 // Used to determine whether the DLL can be unloaded by OLE.
00046 STDAPI DllCanUnloadNow(void)
00047 {
00048             return _AtlModule.DllCanUnloadNow();
00049     }
00050 
00051 // Returns a class factory to create an object of the requested type.
00052 STDAPI DllGetClassObject(REFCLSID rclsid, REFIID riid, LPVOID* ppv)
00053 {
00054         return _AtlModule.DllGetClassObject(rclsid, riid, ppv);
00055 }
00056 
00057 // DllRegisterServer - Adds entries to the system registry.
00058 STDAPI DllRegisterServer(void)
00059 {
00060     // registers object, typelib and all interfaces in typelib
00061     HRESULT hr = _AtlModule.DllRegisterServer();
00062         return hr;
00063 }
00064 
00065 // DllUnregisterServer - Removes entries from the system registry.
00066 STDAPI DllUnregisterServer(void)
00067 {
00068     HRESULT hr = _AtlModule.DllUnregisterServer();
00069         return hr;
00070 }
00071 
00072 // DllInstall - Adds/Removes entries to the system registry per user per machine.
00073 STDAPI DllInstall(BOOL bInstall, LPCWSTR pszCmdLine)
00074 {
00075     HRESULT hr = E_FAIL;
00076     static const wchar_t szUserSwitch[] = L"user";
00077 
00078     if (pszCmdLine != NULL)
00079     {
00080         if (_wcsnicmp(pszCmdLine, szUserSwitch, _countof(szUserSwitch)) == 0)
00081         {
00082             ATL::AtlSetPerUserRegistration(true);
00083         }
00084     }
00085 
00086     if (bInstall)
00087     {   
00088         hr = DllRegisterServer();
00089         if (FAILED(hr))
00090         {
00091             DllUnregisterServer();
00092         }
00093     }
00094     else
00095     {
00096         hr = DllUnregisterServer();
00097     }
00098 
00099     return hr;
00100 }
